title: A Trade for tomorrow
creator_credit: Eric Porter Productions, Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Michael Robertson
brief_description: Explains the typical training apprentices are given at HMAS Nirimba. Shows that the training in the navy can prepare them for outside jobs when they have finished their time.
